author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE WEAKENING BUT STILL A HURRICANE AS IT MOVES AWAY FROM THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...HONE WEAKENING BUT STILL A HURRICANE AS IT MOVES AWAY FROM THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 5:00 PM HST Sun Aug 25
 the center of Hone was located near 19.1, -158.6
 with movement W at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 994 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.
